org.drupal.project.computing

Class DServicesSite

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drupal.project.computing.DSite
      • org.drupal.project.computing.DServicesSite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DSiteExtended

    public class DServicesSite
extends DSite
implements DSiteExtended
    Uses Drupal Services REST Server to access Drupal.
